DESC_ROLL: Rolls a set number of dice each containing up to the number specified at the end
DESC_CREATERULES: Creates a null version of the rules up to the number passed into the command
DESC_RULE: Posts the details of the specified rule
DESC_SETRULE: Modifies the rule by its number
DESC_SETRULEDESC: Sets the specifications and descriptions of the given rule
DESC_POSTRULES: Posts the complete formatted rules if it exists
DESC_HUMBLE: Lists all humble bundle deals in the last 48 hours.
